name: recycle (itch) (Adam Smith)
description:
This game was a submission for the HackHer413 Hackathon

This project was an interesting way to get a conversation started about the benefits of reducing waste consumption, which is an ongoing battle we face in the fight for the future of our climate. This game subtly brought to light the adverse and unforseen implications of a shifting climate, such as sudden sporatic changes in weather patterns. 

But there are ways to limit the spread of our damage on the environment, some methods which are catching a lot of momentum include upcycling tarnished clothing and the reuse of solid plastics. Limiting the rapid nature that our atmosphere is warming will help fight off a climate where with warmer temperatures, illness and viral transmissions are likely to occur in greater and greater numbers due to increased moisture in the air.
